title: Attach
content:
Some cards instruct you to attach them to other cards. When you do, place the attached card underneath the card to which it is attached with a bit poking out to remind you that it’s there.

Faceup attached cards are considered to be “in play,” while facedown attached cards are not.

There is no limit to the number of cards that can be attached to a card.

When a card is attached facedown, discard any tokens from it.

When a card leaves play, any cards attached to it are discarded.

Some cards can attach to your role. You can still interact with these cards.

Resolve challenge effects on cards attached to your role as if they were within reach.

When you interact with other cards in play, cards attached to your role always count as being between you and that card. That is, a ready card attached to your role will fatigue you when you interact with another card in play.

On rare occasions, a card can become attached to a card that is itself attached to another card. There is no limit to the amount of cards that can be attached in this way.

Camoveave Cloak with Universal Power Cells attached
